Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; FAYENCE; GLAZED
Name: Rosette, element of a beaded collar
Description: This rosette of pale rose faience with yellow central part and reddish eye for suspending could be incorporated into a broad collar with its floral motifs. Dating of a separate unprovenanced bead causes a problem, however, necklaces with such pendants were manufactured in abundance in the 18th dynasty.
